title: Modern Times, Ancient Fears: Superstition Fuels Brutal Killing in Karbi Anglong
description: A couple was murdered in Karbi Anglong over witchcraft suspicions, highlighting tribal superstitions.

title: Goa Gets Its 3rd District 'Kushavati', Named After Ancient River
description: Goa Chief Minister Pramod Sawant on Wednesday said the proposed third district in the state will be called 'Kushavati', named after a river that flows through the region.

title: 'Trump’s EPA' in 2025: A fossil fuel-friendly approach to deregulation
Our ancestors were CANNIBALS: Scientists discover grisly evidence ancient human species ate Neanderthal children 45,000 years ago
description: Early humans may have feasted on Neanderthal children 45,000 years ago, according to a grisly new study.

title: Bad Bunny’s museum visit sparks controversy weeks before his Super Bowl halftime show, singer slammed for touching ancient artifact
description: Global music sensation Bad Bunny faced backlash after touching an ancient Maya artifact during a museum visit in Mexico City, prompting a reminder from authorities about preserving historical sites. This controversy emerges as the artist gears up for a highly anticipated Super Bowl halftime show, a performance already drawing mixed reactions and intense public scrutiny.
